name: whirlwind
effect:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.

flavor_text_entries.gold-silver:
Blows away the foe
& ends battle.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
Blows away the foe
& ends battle.
flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Blows away the foe with
wind and ends the battle.

Blows away the foe with
wind and ends the battle.

The foe is made to
switch out with an
ally. In the wild,
the battle ends.

in its party. In the

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
